name: LOOSE!
description:
Load rocks into your catapult and launch them over the walls. Switch to your scout in the tower for a better view of your shot, reload, adjust, and LOOSE!

Controls
WASD - Move

LShift - Sprint

E - Pickup/drop object, operate gears/levers, Grab onto catapult

Q - Alternate operate gear/levers (other direction)

Tab - Switch characters

credits:
